forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. South southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 1pm and 5pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 55 overnight. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
